Package com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Class CommonArguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.CommonArguments
  • public final class CommonArguments
extends Object
    This class regroup commons arguments used by the different CLI.

      • useSSLArgument

        public static BooleanArgument useSSLArgument()
                                      throws ArgumentException

        N.B : the 'Z' short option is also used by ldapsport.
        Returns:
        The "useSSL" argument.
        Throws:
